object.description: Indicates the type of object, in this case, a product.

active.description: Indicates if the product is active or not.

items.description: List of custom attributes associated with the product.

caption.description: A short description or title for the product.

created.description: Timestamp indicating the creation date of the product.

items.description: List of reasons or events that might lead to product deactivation.

description.description: A detailed description of the product.

items.description: List of images associated with the product.

livemode.description: Indicates if the product is in live mode or test mode.

properties.description: Custom key-value pairs associated with the product.

width.description: Width dimension of the product package.

length.description: Length dimension of the product package.

height.description: Height dimension of the product package.

shippable.description: Indicates if the product is shippable or not.

statement_descriptor.description: Descriptor displayed in the customer's statement for this product.

type.description: Type or category of the product.

unit_label.description: Label representing the unit of the product.

updated.description: Timestamp indicating the last update date of the product.

url.description: URL pointing to more details or information about the product.

default_price.description: The default price set for the product.

tax_code.description: Tax code associated with the product.

name.description: Name of a specific feature associated with the product.

is_deleted.description: Indicates if the product has been deleted.
